misc: Bags Miura irons and is rumoured to sleep with them.
biography: Miso is a highly accomplished golfer who has made a name for himself at the prestigious Hirsala Golf Club.  His dedication to the game is evident in his consistent performance at the annual Hector Trophée, a tournament in which he's participated since 2022.

Miso’s Hector Trophée record is impressive, marking his presence as a force to be reckoned with.  While he’s yet to claim the Victor trophy for individual performance, his partnership triumph in Hector Trophée III is a testament to his skill and strategic prowess.

Known for his meticulous approach, Miso is a player who leaves no stone unturned.  His unwavering commitment is reflected not only in his game, but also in his reported fondness for his Miura irons—a relationship rumoured to be so close he sleeps with them! This unique connection highlights the dedication and focus Miso brings to every aspect of his golfing career.  It will be exciting to see if he can add the Victor trophy to his impressive accolades in future Hector Trophées.
